Does this still need setting in the qt build env if it's now being done in the makefile? If so you should probably note why that's the case:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/e7af2f35af95f4ca51e38c8ac5b05cad8be22489/depends/packages/qt.mk#L177

I assume we could also skip setting `QT_RCC_SOURCE_DATE_OVERRIDE` entirely by using the version 1 format of the generated files. i.e pass `--format-version 1` to `rcc`. From my read of the Qt source, the only thing added in version 2 is the last modified time, which we obviously don't care about.

@fanquake 
> Does this still need setting in the qt build env if it's now being done in the makefile?

No. The determinism is preserved.

> I assume we could also skip setting `QT_RCC_SOURCE_DATE_OVERRIDE` entirely by using the version 1 format of the generated files. i.e pass `--format-version 1` to `rcc`. From my read of the Qt source, the only thing added in version 2 is the last modified time, which we obviously don't care about.

Thanks!. I checked the Qt source code, and implemented your suggestion.

If we're using `--format-version 1`, can't we drop `QT_RCC_SOURCE_DATE_OVERRIDE` ?

Yes! I've overlooked it :man_facepalming:

@laanwj do you have any opinion on passing `--format-version 1` to RCC?

> @laanwj do you have any opinion on passing --format-version 1 to RCC?

Not really. If it improves determinism that's a good thing. I think the only thing to be careful of is that if a new version of Qt adds a new format that is better somehow and differs in more than just this comment, we need to remember to reevaluate this.

@laanwj 
> > @laanwj do you have any opinion on passing --format-version 1 to RCC?
> 
> Not really. If it improves determinism that's a good thing. I think the only thing to be careful of is that if a new version of Qt adds a new format that is better somehow and differs in more than just this comment, we need to remember to reevaluate this.

Do you think the usage of `QT_RCC_SOURCE_DATE_OVERRIDE=1` is safer? (see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21654#issuecomment-819198228)

> Do you think the usage of QT_RCC_SOURCE_DATE_OVERRIDE=1 is safer? (see #21654 (comment))

I don't have a strong opinion on it. I think it's fine to change this.
